After shipping your items will be delivered within 1-10 business days. Terms of Sale Tax applies in: MT About Us Gold Rush Pawn Company opened the doors in Kalispell, Montana in 1980. We are the oldest local family owned and operated pawn shop in the Flathead Valley. There is just one Gold Rush Pawn Company. You get our personal attention when you deal at Gold Rush. We have a friendly knowledgeable staff who treat customers right. We are located just 35 miles from Glacier Park. If you are in the area, make sure to stop in! We do pawn loans plus buy, sell and trade on most items of value. We offer layaways for your convenience. With 10% down, 10% due monthly and 10 months to pay for the item. If you are looking for a pawn loan we have many options. We try to loan you the maximum amounts and we never put an item out for sale before 60 days from the original loan date. That way if you are a few days or even a couple of weeks late, your item will still be waiting for you. We offer 1/2 price 7 day loans as well. Our log storefront is also home to Gold Rush American Motorcycle and we have a wide selection of parts and accessories for Harley Davidson cycles plus high quality reasonably priced leathers. Everything on our online Buya store is also for sale in our brick and mortar store. If the item you buy online sells in the store, we will apologize and give you a full refund. We will suggest something similar if we have it. All items and accessories included in our listings are shown the photographs. If you have any questions or requests, please ask. If you don't see what you are looking for in the store, you never know... It could be kickin' around here somewhere. We guarantee everything to be as stated in the listing. We stand behind our products. If we miss something, you will get a full or partial refund including shipping costs – your choice. If you decide to return an item because you don't like it, there is a 20% restocking fee and you will be expected to pay the return shipping. World wide international buyers: We always welcome your business. Most Ebay items are shipped through Ebay's global shipping program. We will also ship directly to you. We won't misrepresent item costs or descriptions. We also ask that you do not buy or bid on any items that are not allowed to be imported into your country. If you do, the item will probably be confiscated by your customs department. Then you will lose both the item and the money you paid for it. Stop by online or in person. We'd love to see you and promise you won't be disappointed.
